original_title: お天気キャスター☆アイちゃん
overview: Ai is a 19-year-old weather girl on TV, but fails the exam to become a weather forecaster. One day, she meets her ex-boy friend Junji. Junji tells Ai that he becomes a script writer. Junji lies to Ai in the hope to win Ai back. They gradually help each other to understand more of their dreams...
title: Weather Girl
